original_title: ลูกบ้าเที่ยวล่าสุด
overview: Manop, a kind and nice guy, accidentally involves in so many unfortunate events and thinks that this is the sign telling him that death will comes to him soon, but Yo didn’tt think so. Yo, Manop’s best friend, thinks that all this is a good luck sign. At least one good thing about Manop is his love with Arin, his colleague that he secretly falls in love with.
title: Crazy Me
